alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 12:39PM PDT until October 12 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph are expected, shifting to northeast late tonight and Thursday morning. There will be local gusts to 50 mph in the foothills and in the western Santa Monica mountains. * WHERE...Central Ventura County Valleys, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
